title.rendered: Modernization of an education and collaboration platform for healthcare professionals

<title>An Education and Collaboration Platform Modernization for Healthcare Professionals — ITRex</title>
<meta name="description" content="ITRex helped restore the core functionality of a multi-functional platform for healthcare professionals and expanded it with new features.
